languages.text: Вскоре слугам велели покинуть Санктум Навис, и Леди-Навигатор взялась за кисть. В трансе она водила по холсту, рисуя картину поверх картины, поверх картины... А затем Лорд-капитан заметил{mf||а} тварь... по ту сторону... Рисунок, перекрытый свежим слоем крови, оживал, но Леди-Навигатор словно этого не замечала! Тогда Лорд-капитан..."

traits.locale_text: Вскоре слугам велели покинуть Санктум Навис, и Леди-Навигатор взялась за кисть. В трансе она водила по холсту, рисуя картину поверх картины, поверх картины... А затем Лорд-капитан заметил{mf||а} тварь... по ту сторону... Рисунок, перекрытый свежим слоем крови, оживал на наших глазах! Когтистые лапы стремились вырваться на волю, но Леди-Навигатор словно этого не замечала! Тогда...

languages.text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."
languages.original_text: Вскоре слугам велели покинуть Санктум Навис, и Леди-Навигатор взялась за кисть. В трансе она водила по холсту, рисуя картину поверх картины, поверх картины... А затем Лорд-капитан заметил{mf||а} тварь... по ту сторону... Рисунок, перекрытый свежим слоем крови, оживал, но Леди-Навигатор словно этого не замечала! Тогда Лорд-капитан..."

languages.text: まもなく従者たちはサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスを発つ命令を受け、航宙士殿は絵筆を手に取り画布をなぞっていた。イメージの上に新たなイメージを重ねて描き、その上にまた新たなイメージを、またその上に…そしてロード・キャプテンは気付いたのだ、ひとつの作品の…その向こう…新鮮な血の層で覆われたその絵は命を宿していたが、航宙士殿は無関心だった。その時だ、ロード・キャプテンは…」
languages.original_text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: まもなく従者たちはサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスを発つ命令を受け、航宙士殿は絵筆を手に取り画布をなぞっていた。イメージの上に新たなイメージを重ねて描き、その上にまた新たなイメージを、またその上に…そしてロード・キャプテンは気付いたのだ、ひとつの作品の…その向こう…新鮮な血の層で覆われたその絵は命を宿していたが、航宙士殿は無関心だった。その時だ、ロード・キャプテンは…」

languages.text: “没过多久，那些仆人就奉命离开了导航者圣所。导航者女士拿起了她的画笔，开始认认真真地在画布上画着，一个又一个图案出现在画布上，然后又画出了新的图案，然后……然后舰长大人注意到了。画布的另一边……有什么东西……那幅画上涂满了鲜血，好像要活过来一样，可导航者女士却完全没注意到。那个时候，舰长大人……”
languages.original_text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: “没过多久，那些仆人就奉命离开了导航者圣所。导航者女士拿起了她的画笔，认认真真地在画布上画着，一个又一个图案出现在画布上，然后又画出了新的图案，然后……然后舰长大人注意到了。画布的另一边……有什么东西……那幅画上涂满了鲜血，好像要活过来一样，可导航者女士却完全没注意到。那个时候，舰长大人……”

languages.text: Les serviteurs ont ensuite reçu l'ordre de quitter le sanctum navis. Quand elle s'est retrouvée seule, la dame navigatrice s'est mise à peindre image après image sur la toile, un peu comme si elle était en transe... C'est là que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} l'a remarqué. Il y avait quelque chose... de l'autre côté... Sous nos yeux, le tableau couvert d'une couche de sang frais était en train de prendre vie, sans que la dame navigatrice ne semble se rendre compte de quoi que ce soit. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine}... »
languages.original_text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: Les serviteurs ont ensuite reçu l'ordre de quitter le sanctum navis. Quand elle s'est retrouvée seule, la dame navigatrice s'est mise à peindre image après image sur la toile, un peu comme si elle était en transe... C'est là que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} l'a remarqué. Il y avait quelque chose... de l'autre côté... Sous nos yeux, le tableau couvert d'une couche de sang frais était en train de prendre vie, sans que la dame navigatrice ne semble se rendre compte de quoi que ce soit. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine}... »

languages.text: Al cabo se ordenó a los sirvientes que abandonasen el Sanctum Navis, y la lady Navegante tomó su pincel. Sumida en un trance, comenzó a deslizarlo sobre el lienzo, pintando una imagen tras otra, y otra sobre la anterior, y otra más... Y entonces {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se dio cuenta. Había algo... al otro lado... El cuadro, cubierto con una capa de sangre fresca, cobró vida, pero la lady Navegante ni siquiera era consciente. Fue entonces cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...».
languages.original_text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: Al cabo se ordenó a los sirvientes que abandonasen el Sanctum Navis, y la lady Navegante tomó su pincel. Sumida en un trance, comenzó a deslizarlo sobre el lienzo, pintando una imagen tras otra, y otra sobre la anterior, y otra más... Y entonces {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se dio cuenta. Había algo... al otro lado... El cuadro, cubierto con una capa de sangre fresca, cobró vida, pero la lady Navegante ni siquiera era consciente. Fue entonces cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...».

languages.text: Bald wurde den Dienern befohlen, das Sanctum Navis zu verlassen, und die Lady Navigator nahm ihren Pinsel in die Hand. Wie verzaubert strich sie mit dem Pinsel über die Leinwand, malte ein neues Bild über das erste, ein weiteres über das zweite, wieder ein weiteres über dieses ... Und dann bemerkte der Lord Captain es. Da war etwas ... auf der anderen Seite ... Das Bild, mit einer Schicht aus frischem Blut überzogen, erwachte zum Leben, doch die Lady Navigator bemerkte es gar nicht. Der Lord Captain ..."
languages.original_text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: Bald wurde den Dienern befohlen, das Sanctum Navis zu verlassen, und die Lady Navigator nahm ihren Pinsel in die Hand. Wie verzaubert strich sie mit dem Pinsel über die Leinwand, malte ein neues Bild über das erste, ein weiteres über das zweite, wieder ein weiteres über dieses ... Und dann bemerkte der Lord Captain es. Da war etwas ... auf der anderen Seite ... Das Bild, mit einer Schicht aus frischem Blut überzogen, erwachte zum Leben, doch die Lady Navigator bemerkte es gar nicht. Der Lord Captain ..."

languages.text: Çok geçmeden hizmetkârlara Navis Kutağı'ndan çıkmaları emredildi, Leydi Rotacı da fırçasını eline aldı. Transa girip fırçayı tuvale sürtmeye, birbiri ardına üst üste resimler çizmeye başladı... Sonra Lord Kaptan bir şey fark etti. Öteki tarafta... Bir şey vardı... Daha yeni akıtılmış kanla kaplı resim canlanıyordu ama Leydi Rotacı bunun farkında değildi. İşte bu noktada Lord Kaptan..."
languages.original_text: Soon the servants were ordered to leave the Sanctum Navis, and the Lady Navigator picked up her brush. Entranced, she started dragging it across the canvas, painting one image over another, and another one over the last, and another... And then the Lord Captain noticed it. There was a thing... on the other side... The picture, covered in a layer of fresh blood, was coming to life, but the Lady Navigator was oblivious. That is when the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: Çok geçmeden hizmetkârlara Navis Kutağı'ndan çıkmaları emredildi ve Leydi Rotacı fırçasını eline aldı. Transa girip fırçayı tuvale sürtmeye, birbiri ardına üst üste resimler çizmeye başladı... Sonra Lord Kaptan bir şey fark etti. Öteki tarafta... Bir şey vardı... Daha yeni akıtılmış kanla kaplı resim canlanıyordu ama Leydi Rotacı bunun farkında değildi. İşte bu noktada Lord Kaptan..."
